CVE.summary: Unspecified vulnerability in the 2D component in the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) component in Oracle Java SE 7 Update 15 and earlier, 6 Update 41 and earlier, and 5.0 Update 40 and earlier allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via unknown vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2013-1493.

vFeed.Product: vFeed - The Correlated Vulnerability and Threat Database
vFeed.Author: NJ OUCHN
